name: siteVerification_webResource_update
description: Modify the list of owners for your website or domain.

id.description: The id of a verified site or domain.

fields.description: Selector specifying which fields to include in a partial response.

key.description: API key. Your API key identifies your project and provides you with API access, quota, and reports. Required unless you provide an OAuth 2.0 token.

oauth_token.description: OAuth 2.0 token for the current user.

prettyPrint.description: Returns response with indentations and line breaks.

quotaUser.description: An opaque string that represents a user for quota purposes. Must not exceed 40 characters.

id.description: The string used to identify this site. This value should be used in the "id" portion of the REST URL for the Get, Update, and Delete operations.

owners.description: The email addresses of all verified owners.

site.description: The address and type of a site that is verified or will be verified.

identifier.description: The site identifier. If the type is set to SITE, the identifier is a URL. If the type is set to INET_DOMAIN, the site identifier is a domain name.

type.description: The site type. Can be SITE or INET_DOMAIN (domain name).

$ul: **id**: The string used to identify this site. This value should be used in the "id" portion of the REST URL for the Get, Update, and Delete operations.
**owners**: The email addresses of all verified owners.
**site**: The address and type of a site that is verified or will be verified.
**identifier**: The site identifier. If the type is set to SITE, the identifier is a URL. If the type is set to INET_DOMAIN, the site identifier is a domain name.
**type**: The site type. Can be SITE or INET_DOMAIN (domain name).
